Dear {full}

We have reviewed and approved your healthcare waste referral form.

Your first/only collection starts on {DatePicked}

The collection can take place anytime from 07:00 hours.
Please ensure your boxes are closed, and that your postcode is marked on each box. If the boxes are not closed or the postcode marked on them, this may mean the boxes are not collected.
If the collection of the boxes is not required, please call us on 023 9284 1105 by 12:00 hours on the day before collection.

If you have any queries about this, please contact the waste service on 023 9284 1105.

Yours sincerely

Portsmouth City Council {#emailEnd}
